112.content:
Vegeta was training on the gravity machine for hours while practicing his movements. Bulma had made many modifications in the gravity room and used a lot of pluto and other rare elements for the control panel


"Tsss ..... Tssss i can continue all the day ..... this is nothing" he said as he continued training at the highest level of severity for several hours preparing for all kinds of pressure



"Tsss this is so weak .... i need another level for training" Vegeta tried to train with more difficulties but he was at the maximum height of the room so he walked to the control panel while observing how to improve it


Vegeta didn't understand anything and started hitting the control panel out of despair and started to get out of control while the room exploded and disappeared



Vegeta woke up through some rubble and saw that he was in a totally different place, in fact it was a kind of training room but he realized that everything was exaggeratedly bigger



"What the hell is this .... everything is bigger ..... how did this happen .... what the hell did Bulma use for that machine !?" He kept walking and screaming while the door opened and a giant entered and saw him


who was?
112.title: Vegeta

choices: Vegeta wants to punch this woman for what she did to him
Vegeta can't move, shizune enters and find him
Tsunade sees some red blood on her hand and check the bug she slapped
1122.content:
Vegeta saw a giant blonde woman wearing a green cape. That's when he realized that the room he was in was also gigantic, he didn't understand what was going on, and had no time to think about it as the woman was walking right toward him. Vegeta avoided the step by flying and wanted to attack her, but it seemed that he couldn't.

" What's the hell is going on ? ". If it was a problem of ki, he wouldn't be able to fly, so why he couldn't use some energy blast ? This was going to be really dangerous even for him. The saiyan reached the woman's face who spotted him and slapped him to the ground thinking he was a bug. Vegeta landed hardly on the ground, while the woman sat on a chair behind her office.

" So, more and moooore papers to do ! damn why did i accept to be hokage ?! "

What happen ?
1122.title: Tsunade and tiny Vegeta

choices: " No " Tsunade wants to know more about him
11221.content:
Vegeta was angry as Tsunade was just focusing on her papers with no other thoughts about "the bug" she slapped. Vegeta tried to punch her foot as hard as he can, but she didn't feel anything. He then decided to fly around her face. Tsunade felt something annoying and tried to slap it, probably another bug, without even looking at it. Vegeta avoid every slap and went right in front of her eye.

" Oh my..." Tsunade lost her focus on her papers as she looked at the tiny human form. She stood up.

" Are you a tiny human ?"

" My name's Vegeta, i'm the Prince of Saiyans ! are i'll make you pay for what you did to me two minutes ago, unless you accept to help me !" He stated

" what did i do to you ? " The giantess asked.

" You thought i was a bug and you slapped me. No woman can treat me like this ! "

" Are you threatening me ? The fifth hokage ? " Tsunade asked with an anger look on her face
11221.title: Vegeta wants to punch this woman for what she d...

choices: Remained silent, Tsunade has work to do, she put him on her chair and sits
Remained silent, and loose his leg
tiny Bulma suddenly appeared throught a portal
112211.content:
" Yes, i'm threatening you ! " The little Saiyan replied. Half a second later, Tsunade threw him to the ground and placed the heel of her sandal on his right leg, putting a little pressure causing Vegeta to scream.

" It's not a good thing to threat a giant Hokage ! But considering you call yourself 'saiyan' or something, and that you don't hesistate to get into a fight with me at your size, i think you're definitely not from my world." The woman said keeping her pressure on the leg without crushing it.


"Damn all these trainings...and i'm helpless " Vegeta complained to himself.

" Do you think you can tell me what's going without insulting me ? If that can help, i'm sorry i've slapped you, i thought you were a bug. In my world, tiny people are not common. What do you say ? Are you sorry ? "

Vegeta's pride told him to suffer the consequences by remaining silent, mostly because in his actual position, he remembered when 18 broke his arm under her boot. But this time, the woman was giant, and it can be more than his leg to be crushed if she wanted to.

So what can he do ?
112211.title: " Yes ! " Vegeta suffers the consequences

1142.content:
After Cell's death, Gohan knew he was going to spend a good night. Even Chichi was not angry at him, mostly because Goku died on the day, and Gohan just had to save the world instead of him.
Gohan eats a lot and went to sleep, but when he woke up, something was different...he was in the middle of a village...a big village from what he could see. Giants people were passing by him, and Gohan tried to fly away, but he couldn't...was he in a dream or something ? he didn't know. But he managed by himself to avoid being stepped on.

" What does that mean ? " He wondered to himself. Also, the people looked differents, like primitives. What was happenning.

He had no time to focus on his questions when someone spotted him...
1142.title: Teenage Gohan

choices: Ino have a conversation with Gohan
Ino leaves him there for a while she's enjoying her power
11422.content:
A loud giant step landed next to him causing the earth quake, from his point of view at last. Gohan looked up to see a giant blonde woman looking at him with surprise.

" Oh....Are you a real personn ? " Ino Yamanaka crouched down and placed her gigantic palm next to the boy. " Come here "

Gohan remained suspicious, he was confused about what was going on thought that this girl seemed nice. He felt something that worried him : his KI. He couldn't feel it and even if he wanted to fly away right now, he knew he just couldn't. So he was just helpless, but accepted anyway to walk into the girl's palm who smiled and brought him to her face.

" My name's Ino. What's yours ? "


" Gohan. Where am i ? " The boy asked.

" You're at Konoha. " Ino replied. Seein the boy's weird expression she realized he didn't know the village.

" Guess what ? You're coming with me and i'll explain everything to you, are you ok ? " The blonde asked nicely

Gohan nodded and with that, she placed the cute boy in her cleavage. " You'll be safe and comfy here, no one will see you "

Gohan wasn't sure how to feel, he never been so a close to a girl, and this one was giant, beautiful and she just put him with her gigantic boobs. This was...embarrassing, but he didn't feel bad. It was dark, but hot and comfy as she said. Gohan decided to believe her.

Once Ino arrived home...
11422.title: a girl called Ino

1151.content:
Trunks was enjoying being in his free world after defeating Zamasu and while Mai was preparing some things to do Trunks was curious about his mother's time machine



"Mmm my mother worked very hard on this ...... and there are many ..... buttons and devices here ........ she never told me what exactly they are ..... she just told me he said not to touch them ”.. Trunks wondered as he entered the time machine and tried to understand the functions


Suddenly Trunks pressed a button by mistake and the machine turned on and disappeared with him



Trunks ended up in a different world when the time machine exploded he had to go back and he noticed that everything in this world is bigger. He was shocked to see this and was quick to hide when he passed under the door entering a house.



Trunks walked in a room carrying his sword prepared for everything when he heard huge footsteps and saw a person watching him



Who watch him?

11512.content:
Kushina was cooking at the kitchen when something got her attention : something walking on the ground toward her.

" Hmmmm ? what's that ? " Kushina wondered, curious.

Trunks takes his sword in two hands ready to fight the giant woman he was facing right now.


Kushina bent down and looked deeper at him. " Are you...human ? "


" Yes i am ! " Trunks replied, stressed. He didn't know what to do in this situation, all he knew was to wait the giantess's reaction first.

Kushina then smiled :
11512.title: Kushina

choices: Kushina wants to know more about trunks's story while she's cooking
Kushina doesn"t really care, she keep him and that's all
Kushina tries to step on him
115122.content:
"Soooo you're probably a little spy from another village ! " Kushina said as she grabbed him and held him in a strong fist. " Tell me who you are and what do you want from me ?! "

" My name's trunks, and i need help to save my world which is suffering from a god right now " The boy replied trying to breath.

" Try again ! " Kushina replied starting to get angry and squeezing trunks in her hand.

" I'm telling you the truth ! i even have something to come back in my world, just come with me and you'll see ! "

" Or....i'll be a prisonner of your village, and you still didn't tell me why ?! "

Trunks felt that he couldn't convince the giantess. She was telling about spy and village, what can he do to proof his story ? He didn't know, so the only option for him was...

"Well if you don't believe me, what will do ? You can let me go and things are solved for you."

"....Or i can just keep you prisonner until i figure out who you are ! " Kushina replied with anger.

Trunks remained silent.
115122.title: Kushina catches him and interrogates the boy

Videl was training very hard to be better than ever since Buu was defeated. She trained hard at the gym every day and found it fun

Tenten picked her up by the arm and raised Videl to her face : " who are you and why are you so small ? " She asked with a strange smile.

" My name's videl and i made a wish with the dragon ball to find a challenge i can deal with " Videl replied

" A wish ? Dragon Balls ? What's these things ? " Tenten wondered mostly to herself.

" Wait ! it seems that we don't share the same world since we have different size." Videl explained." But please can you stop held me like that ? My arm hurt "

" Woops ! sorry " The giant apologized and put videl in her palm. " what do you mean by challenges ? "

" I need some training, but from a human just like me, not a Saiyan "

" Saiyan ? "

" Forget it. " Videl sighed

" Anyway if you need some training i can help you with that but i'm not sure this will be interesting to me as much as for you....hmmmmm give me something and i'll help you ! " Tenten stated with a huge smile.

" What can if offer ?" Videl wondered what a giant stranger could expect from her...

1211.content:
Tsunade looked at the window of her office, seeing a giant woman destroying her village for no reason and get angry when Shizune entered with Naruto Sasuke and Sakura.

" Tsunade Sama, here's kakashi's team as you asked. "

" Can you tell us what's going on right now ? " Sasuke said.

" You three, come here and see. This is the reason i've cancelled your mission. " Tsunade replied without turning back.

" What's the ?" Sakura was shocked just like Sasuke to see a giant blonde woman stomping on everything. Naruto was too focused on the giantess's beauty, but Sakura slapped him to bring him back to reality.

" I know what you were thinking little perv ! But this is no time ! "

" So...sorry ! " Naruto apologized and realized the threat. " Who is she and why she's attacking us ? "

" that's the reason i brought you. Your mission will be at first to try to calm her down and get a conversation with her. Naruto you're the best at talking and concince an ennemy to stop. You'll be the leader of the Team 7." Tsunade stated, chocking both Sasuke and Sakura.

" Are you....serious ? " Sakura said.

" Truly serious, so now go on ! " i'll help the villagers with Katsuyu, i need a report as soon as possible "

" Hehe sure you can count on me grandma ! " Naruto replied wih joy. " Sasuke, Sakura, let's go ! "

The two followed Naruto with a depressive look on their face.

_____________________________

Pan was searching for gadgets in Bulma's lab for her trip to space with Goku and Trunks as they wait for her on the ship. Pan was looking for a device that would be useful in his travels until he found a strange pistol



"Uh? .... what is this?" Pan wondered as he picked up the strange weapon and began to aim at things by playing with the weapon. when Pan fired the weapon a strange lightning bolt came out and released a huge ring that became a great portal

Pan noticed that everything was much smaller now, she saw the mountains and small trees and was amused to see everything smaller than her "Hehehe this looks so cute ...... I am very big now" Pan said as he found one small village along the way

1253344.content:
Trunks spent his las days avoiding to be killed by Black, saving his mother and Mai on the way. He couldn't believe how things turned on to his world, since he defeated Cell. Sometimes he felt like they were cursed.

Now they were in the last place Bulma build at the time of the androids, an underground laboratory. This is where Bulma tried to work on another timeline machine, but she needed one last essential material that couldn't be found anymore. So she worked on something else, but more dangerous.


" All right it's done. Take this " Bulma said giving her son a small bean.

" A senzu bean ? " both Trunks and Mai asked.

" Not really. Don't eat that ! Just drop it on the ground and it will open a portal.

" This will send me into the past, like the timemachine ? "

" No. And that's the reason i wish i could have build a time machine again. With this portal, you'll be send in a random powerfull world, where you'll be able to find some strong allies from what i know. " Bulma explained.

" What's the problem then ? It should be more interesting ! " Mai said.

" That's because you'll don't know the people, just they won't know you either. Beside it's possible that you land in a world where the atmosphere can kill you instantly, or in a world that doesn"t exist anymore, etc...It's really dangerous when you don't know where you'll land."

" I see " Trunks said. " But we have no choice now". Mai nodded. With that, Trunks threw the bean to the ground creating a portal as expected. He took a deep breath and was about to walk throught it, when Bulma stopped him.
1253344.title: Future Trunks's last hope

Naruto appeared in a giant beautiful beach.

" Woooooooow !! " he yelled amazed but this whole new environnement. " Don't understand why this is a forbidden jutsu...." he started to think, but it didn't matter for now. All he wanted right now was to swim, after all there's no beach at Konoha. As he was about to remove his clothes, a huge shadow surrendered him.

" Hmmmmm...?!" The boy turned back to see....a giant woman looking down at him !! " What's the,,,?!"

" Are you...a tiny person ? What are you doing here ? " the woman asked suspicious.

" Well, i used that scroll from the Hokage, wait, where is it ? " Naruto began to panick as he didn't know where the scroll was, and without that he just couldn't get back to the leaf !!

" Scroll...Hokage...i don't know what you mean " The giantess said.

" I'm from Konoha, don't you know my village ? " Naruto asked, trying to not fall in love with this giant beautiful blonde woman wearing some weird clothes, but stills sexy. A blue jean, some sandals, and a blue jacket without sleeves.

"No. Anyway what's your name little boy ? "

" I'm naruto Uzumaki !! hehe maybe you can help me to find my scroll ? " The boy replied confident. But the woman looked at him in a way he felt uncomfortable with.

" I don't think so." she stated " I think......

Tamari got tired of destroying and started seeing all the people running and started laughing a lot. Duty was very big and I was thinking of staying for a long time


What happens next
143.title: Temari

144.content:
Sakura was tired of training so much and decided to rest a little while they had problems to improve. Tsunade saw her very focused and explained that if she wanted to feel better and stronger he could take her to a new place


Sakura got excited by that idea and accompanied Tsunade to her office while she uses a special jutsu that opened a portal that sent Sakura to another world.


Sakura woke up and noticed that she was huge "Ahhh what is this .... I am very big ...... is this what Tsunade was referring to? ..... mmm well I like this hehehe" she laughed a lot while watching around it


Sakura saw many people running from her presence and she was funny to see them she was having a lot of fun while walking but suddenly something hit her on the head. she turned around angrily to see who it was


She turn back and see:
144.title: Sakura

1452.content:
Ino was excited to be practicing some new Jutsus while practicing all day long "This is great ... what great new jutsus are these"


After several hours she had one last Jutsu left which she used towards a large rock and suddenly a portal appeared surrounding him "Whoa is this?" Ino said excitedly as she carefully stepped into the portal to find out what she found.


Ino stayed in a strange world and started noticing that she was huge and everything was small "Hehehe how is this possible? ... well it matters ... it's great!"


Ino started walking while looking at various places to go. She had several options and liked to have this new size.


Where did she decide to go?
1452.title: Ino

info.brief_description: A GTS story where everything goes in this crossover !
info.description:
Here we go ! You can have a giant Naruto character meeting a tiny DB character, or the opposite with a giant DB character meeting a tiny shinobi. What can happen?

The idea for this, is that a dimensionnal portal appears, a character goes throught it and lands shrunk or giant in another world. Just keept this in mind ;)

Every stuff is allowed, including sex, but please try to keep the coherence in the story
info.pretty_title: Naruto / Dragon Ball crossover GTS Story
